name: simple-hls-streamer
description: Simple HLS streaming server with concat file support

scripts.build:windows: npm run download-ffmpeg:windows && node node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js src/simple-gui-index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/hls-streamer-windows.exe --config package.json
scripts.build:windows:cli: npm run download-ffmpeg:windows && node node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js src/index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/hls-streamer-cli-windows.exe --config package.json
scripts.build:windows:systray: npm run download-ffmpeg:windows && node node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js src/gui-index.js --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/hls-streamer-systray-windows.exe --config package.json
scripts.build:linux: npm run download-ffmpeg:linux && node node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js src/simple-gui-index.js --targets node18-linux-x64 --output dist/hls-streamer-linux
scripts.build:macos: npm run download-ffmpeg:macos && node node_modules/pkg/lib-es5/bin.js src/simple-gui-index.js --targets node18-macos-x64 --output dist/hls-streamer-macos
scripts.build:all: npm run build:windows && npm run build:linux && npm run build:macos
